Class LED

java.lang.Object
  LED

public class LED
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a LED connected to the Raspberry pi on a given pin (default pin 6). Connect the physical LED to a GND pin and to a GPIO pin.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ian Utting, Fabio Heday

Constructor Summary
LED()
          Connect to an LED attached to the default GPIO pin (6).
LED(int pin)
          Connect to an LED attached to the given pin number.
 
Method Summary
 boolean isOn()
          Checks if the the LED is on.
 void off()
          Turn off the LED.
 void on()
          Turn on the LED.
